mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO memberNo, FK_CATEGORY_NO categoryNo, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_PWD memberPwd, NICKNAME nickName, MEMBER_NAME memberName, PHONE phone, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = #{memberPwd} AND FK_CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}

SELECT ADDRESS_NO addressNo, SC.STATE_CODE stateCode, STATE_NAME stateName, ADDRESS_TYPE addressType, DISTRICT district FROM TB_ADDRESS AD JOIN TB_STATE_CATEGORY SC ON(SC.STATE_CODE = AD.STATE_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER ME ON(AD.MEMBER_NO = ME.MEMBER_NO) WHERE ME.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY ADDRESS_NO DESC
